remarks: A member of a set of extended reals is greater than or equal to the set's infimum.  Note that we did not introduce a notation for the infimum, so we represent it as the supremum for the opposite order relation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Mar-2014.)
statement: infmxrlb $p |- ( ( A C_ RR* /\ B e. A ) -> sup ( A , RR* , `' < ) <_ B ) $.
